text: Sakao Island (), also known as Khoti Island is an island in Vanuatu, located off the southeastern shore of Vanuatu's second largest island Malakula in Malampa Province.Sakao Island from Geoview.info The island is about 3 km in width and 0.8 km in length . ==See also== *List of islands of Vanuatu ==References== Category:Islands of Vanuatu Category:Sanma Province
title: Sakao Island (Malampa, Vanuatu)
